author: .vbuterin
content: What rate of change per block does filecoin use? (and what's the block interval)

author: kubuxu
content: 30s block interval and 12.5% max change per block

author: kubuxu
content: Regarding default miner tip, we've set the default quite low, we want to run analysis similar to what Eth has done and figure out the marginal cost of including a message/additional gas in a block but that will be quite different in Filecoin.
